column2: *Gordon hails you over the regular channel. Wow… his face is pale gray, almost stone colored. And he's got a few drops of blood on his lips.*
We… we have all the data required, C-captain! *He coughs. Loudly and with blood, spraying it on his robe.* We will now begin creating the antidote!
Just hurry up. I don't want to fly this ship to Earth alone.
